CWEs: CWE-119: Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer
description: The function uses Buffer.allocUnsafe() to allocate buffer memory. This method of buffer allocation can lead to vulnerabilities as it allows for the creation of a Buffer instance with uninitialized memory. This uninitialized memory may contain sensitive information. It's recommended to use Buffer.alloc() instead, which will initialize the memory with zeros.
